price: 33. Dan Dia telah menundukkan matahari dan bulan bagimu yang terus-menerus beredar (dalam orbitnya); dan telah menundukkan malam dan siang bagimu.
arabic: وَسَخَّرَ لَكُمُ ٱلشَّمۡسَ وَٱلۡقَمَرَ دَآئِبَيۡنِۖ وَسَخَّرَ لَكُمُ ٱلَّيۡلَ وَٱلنَّهَارَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wasakhara lakumu al-shamsa wal-qamara dāibayni wasakhara lakumu al-layla wal-nahāra
